mapper.select: select * from ( select a.*, rownum rn from (select users.* from users order by userid) a ) a where rn between (#{page}-1) * #{pageSize}+1 and #{page} * #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into users (userid, userNm, alias, addr1, addr2, zipcode, pass, reg_dt,filename,realfilename) values (#{userId}, #{userNm}, #{alias}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{zipcode}, #{pass}, sysdate,#{filename}, #{realFilename})
mapper.update: update users set pass =#{pass} where userid=#{userId}
